PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10302024-09-20ISED
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - Research Council Employees' Association ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employees' Association that covers all employees in the in the ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES Group bargaining unit, for the period beginning on May 1, 2022, and ending on April 30, 2026.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Research Council Employees' Association that covers all employees in the in the ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES Group bargaining unit, for the period beginning on May 1, 2022, and ending on April 30, 2026.
